Package com.arbibot.ports.input

Interface ForTriangularArbitraging

All Known Implementing Classes:
TriangularArbitrage
public interface ForTriangularArbitraging
Interface exposing methods to perform triangular arbitrage.
Since:
1.0
Author:
SChoumiloff, SebastienGuillemin

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    performTriangualarArbitrage(Pair pair1, Pair pair2, Pair pair3, Exchange exchange, BigDecimal quantity)
    Method to perform triangular arbitrage.

  • Method Details

    • performTriangualarArbitrage

      void performTriangualarArbitrage(Pair pair1, Pair pair2, Pair pair3, Exchange exchange, BigDecimal quantity) throws TriangularArbitragingException
      Method to perform triangular arbitrage.
      Parameters:
      pair1 - Initial pair of assets (eg. A/B).
      pair2 - Middle pair that serves as a bridge between the first and the third asset (eg. B/C).
      pair3 - Final pair the is used to convert the middle asset back to the first asset (eg. (C/A)).
      exchange - The exchange where orders are executed.
      quantity - Th equantity to buy with the first order of the arbitrage.
      Throws:
      TriangularArbitragingException - is an error occurs during the arbitrage.
